remarks:
A version of the Axiom of Replacement.  Normally ` ph ` would have free variables ` x ` and ` y ` .  Axiom 6 of [Kunen] p. 12.  The Separation Scheme ~ ax-sep cannot be derived from this version and must be stated as a separate axiom in an axiom system (such as Kunen's) that uses this version in place of our ~ ax-rep .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2003.) 

---

 A version of the Axiom of Replacement.  Normally ` ph ` would have free variables ` x ` and ` y ` .  Axiom 6 of [Kunen] p. 12.  The Separation Scheme ~ ax-sep cannot be derived from this version and must be stated as a separate axiom in an axiom system (such as Kunen's) that uses this version.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2003.)
statement:
zfrep6 $p |- ( A. x e. z E! y ph -> E. w A. x e. z E. y e. w ph ) $.
$d ph w $.
$d w x y z $.
